reactrend 0.0.1
  • Reference

reactrend

reactrend is an R wrapper to react-trend built with reactR.

Installation

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/ractrend")

Examples

library(reactrend)

reactrend(runif(100))
reactrend(
  runif(20), 
  gradient = c('#00c6ff', '#F0F', '#FF0'),
  smooth = TRUE,
  draw = TRUE
)
